https://tmrev.io/movie/26769-Cocaine Cowboys II: Hustlin' with the Godmother 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/edHYJhbT14ZaLdocRBpFqNkgn4.jpg Set in 1991 on the inner-city streets of Oakland, California, cocaine dealer Charles Cosby has his life is changed forever when he writes a fan letter to the "Cocaine Godmother" Griselda Blanco, who is serving time at a nearby federal prison. Six months later, Cosby is a multi-millionaire, Blanco's lover, and the head of her $40 million a year cocaine business. Cocaine Cowboys II: Hustlin' with the Godmother
